title: Search
cleaned_text: All Search Results - [Rica Z. Jester, MD](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/rica-zantua-jester-md/) Dr. Rica Jester is a board-certified family medicine doctor with Orlando Health Physician Associates. She has experience providing primary care for patients 6 and older. Her areas of expertise include: - [Victoria Williams, PA-C](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/victoria-williams-pac/) Victoria Williams is a certified physician assistant (PA-C) with the Orlando Health Heart and Vascular Institute. She works alongside cardiologists in the general cardiology and electrophysiology departments. Her skills include: - [Edwin Ortega, APRN](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/edwin-ortega-aprn/) Edwin Ortega is an advanced practice registered nurse (APRN) with the Endocrinology and Diabetes Center at Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children. He has cared for young patients in Central Florida since 2012, and his expertise includes: - [Frans van Dijk, MD](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/frans-jozef-van-dijk-md/) Dr. diagnostic radiologist and fellowship-trained nuclear radiologist with Orlando Health Medical Group Radiology. He has been in practice for more than 20 years. - [Shannon R. Faulkinberry, MD](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/shannon-r-faulkinberry-md/) Shannon Faulkinberry, MD, MPH, is a board-certified pediatric critical care physician with Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children. She cares for children after surgical procedures or accidents and those with serious medical conditions. She has a special interest in neurocritical care along with medical education, simulation and sedation. - [Shawn McCullough, MD](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/shawn-mccullough-md/) Dr. Shawn McCullough is a primary care physician at Orlando Health Physician Associates. Board certified in internal medicine, he focuses on the prevention, diagnosis and treatment of illnesses and diseases and has special interest in: advanced practice registered nurse (APRN) with Orlando Health Medical Group Endocrinology, where she specializes in treating adults with type 1 and type 2 diabetes, as well as thyroid conditions. - [Sheryl Esmond, PA-C](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/sheryl-esmond-pac/) Sheryl Esmond, MMS, PA-C, is a board-certified physician assistant with Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children Neurosurgery, part of Lean Pediatric Neuroscience Center of Excellence. She manages inpatient and outpatient neurosurgical patients. She also assists in the operating room and cares for patients in intensive care, neonatal intensive care and those in step down and medical floor units. - [Federico Augusto Montalvo, MD](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/federico-augusto-montalvo-bisono-md/) Frederico A. Montalvo, MD, board certified in internal medicine, is a member of the Internal Medicine Faculty Practice at Orlando Health. He works - [Nicole Jordan, APRN](https://www.orlandohealth.com/physician-finder/nicole-jordan-aprn/) Nicole E. Jordan, MSN, APRN, CPNP, IBCLC, is a certified pediatric nurse practitioner caring for children at Orlando Health Arnold Palmer Hospital for Children. She manages care for patients during hospitalization, coordinates follow-up care, and provides outpatient primary care to newborns and infants. Performs physical exams on neonates in the well-baby and transitional care nurseries. She orders and interprets screening tests.
